Level !! Effect |- |0 || x1.25 Coins Earned |- |1 || x1.3 Coins Earned |- |2 || x1.35 Coins Earned |- |3 || x1.4 Coins Earned |- |4 || x1.45 Coins Earned |- |5/Max || x1.5 Coins Earned |- |} ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 500 defeated Pokémon and 50,000 Pokedollars Level 1 to 2 500 defeated Pokémon and 100,000 Pokedollars Level 2 to 3 1500 defeated Pokémon and 250,000 Pokedollars Level 3 to 4 2500 defeated Pokémon and 500,000 Pokedollars Level 4 to 5 5000 defeated Pokémon and 1,000,000 Pokedollars {{Oak items}}
